column5: Thanks everyone who wished me a happy birthday on the thread that Alex started today.  Anyhow, just wanted to share a few things I got for my birthday!!  I did get a new medium heavy rod, fast action yesterday....I landed that salmon with it last night.  Here's the other stuff I got.  If I'm going to try and get some nice Quinte Walleye for the OFC G2G in November...I'll need this stuff!!!  A Shimano trolling rod and an Okuma Magda Pro reel with line counter.  I know it's not high end stuff, but I'll realistically only be using it a few times a year in big waters.   I also got this stuff a few weeks ago...but it was an early birthday present....  Minnkota 30lb thrust Trolling motor....   And deep cycle marine battery with dual mode (10A and 2A) automatic charger.   Anyhow...my family rules...they sure know what to get me dont they??  Now...I gotta go fishing...hopefully a report later, but 4 nights in a row of catching salmon may be a bit too much to ask...but come on...it's my birthday right????  LOL.
Happy birthday Cliff and good luck tonight!
Didn't see the thread, sorry. Happy be-lated Birthday.
Happy Birthday Cliff, great gifts. Great family you have. You'll be able to make good use of that equipment.
WOW...lucky guy you are cliff,happy b-day bud.  ...cheers
Not be-lated you are right on time, xrap
NICE!!!!!!!!!!!! THE OKUMA REEL IS A VERY GOOD REEL!!! LUCKY BOY!!!  FLOATREEL MAYBE NEXT YR IF U STAY GOOD ALL YR  LOL
Nice goodies!  It's great to have a family that knows what you really want.
Great stuff Cliff. I know you will put it to good use..  John
Nice.  I've beat the hell out of one of those Minn Kota Enduras for five years, and it still runs like new.
nice gifts and good luck tonight
Nice Cliff... Good luck out there toinight, are you gonna be sticking that trolling motor on the piers and moving around the lake  lol ? We'll be waiting for the report
Happy Birthday Cliff! Many Happy Returns.  Looks like you are very well taken care of!
